# Teritori Live Peers
Here is a script for you to update `persistent_peers` setting with these peers in `config.toml`.

```
peers="0d19829b0dd1fc324cfde1f7bc15860c896b7ac1@teritori-testnet.nodejumper.io:27656,936819710348ce545b0765e620127cf12bdf7eb0@161.35.162.188:26656,e1b331c1f3cba509960c65d6c6bc9b49532bcbaa@65.109.85.170:27656,d888e05bac5209df36bdeef3497c00c96367a04f@195.201.231.163:26656,9d709483ac8dbbe4adf19eb1b4732531254a2045@116.202.236.115:26656,53f69cd52a4b633179b9e762cf8d51f6696a27f6@51.159.141.148:26656,7b66efb5c4d585fddcddb04090b969a899669e6a@212.23.222.220:26556,2da1141f27d403e9d0cd0ecf3f02d71a3ed5031a@94.23.207.45:30529,bf100c1b6b44a6e96ab5691f3023cec3c27747fd@144.126.142.78:46656,ccc59b8a55f9c6e7a24bd693e2796f781ea3a670@65.108.227.133:27656,15dd94f68c450da2c3b7c60b6364e3dce6f0cbf2@185.193.66.68:26641,5ae1012f9b0f4672d8152de903d115dd2f1a3ee3@65.21.170.3:27656,a0017c6dbb92a5ec16c818ce536317f025362d57@194.35.120.148:19656,f74ff9a50d4890552f9c276ce8b8c1c9827a7900@194.35.120.150:19656,653fa7b0d9ce2dd0a73dfac04ed2c28aebb63bf4@149.102.147.59:31656,b33ebb4672f929dddde1365c9678a39abfd881fb@54.202.144.51:26656,0ed91fdc19d96152bf73ec79d11232baf18705ec@38.242.234.178:19656,3b539b6cff93fb3631d0a600a56ade3c6ca6bea3@141.95.104.33:26656,2f565c7b81032822c0cd173386716a1339046fc2@194.35.120.196:19656,9bc14c7dd52b79636e106a300944be500db622c2@65.108.235.107:15656,0e51ebd10636b48b69625677a5154b839ff3f557@65.108.43.116:56107,ac94097daec8a32d4ed3f074f26f214cedfbb541@85.173.112.154:26656,c89ecc57dc30addb7e9032684916725c25b2a6c5@162.55.103.44:26656,6a94690aa76f7ffbfa1ee93c50dddfb571f159b6@5.189.130.43:19656,69012ce642095e15f588ddb154327633bb2ecb9c@65.109.39.223:26656,31413c99357d0cfc48a46767ade171db2ea0205e@135.181.138.160:46656,d590ca2f08c6793516c4923c0a62075c57f64b59@135.181.206.223:26656,f69d6e4029339882a2e6de39e5d902df16989b61@135.181.72.187:11533,ec0c58dbfe67a12ea16951134e29a6566ac05add@185.217.125.98:26656,c56b132be41b247c9f8fa1f2addaca57f9946e29@75.119.159.159:44656,c9be05c0ec5fa032cd10bd59bb6173c025b97f17@135.181.138.161:26676,d5519e378247dfb61dfe90652d1fe3e2b3005a5b@65.109.68.190:19656,7c6deaf1249610bf058f8f2127e0aa6241faa837@65.108.238.217:11054,e1c50c477202e2f37643d044a6cde3c913f42230@65.108.71.92:54256,625b814af9f535b91a92727138838fde0174faff@65.108.124.172:27656,d3b788cb700cf09a868d0c4e745ad54c7835e8c0@195.201.165.123:20026,8bab6c29d5f029e38a229fb7c8069dae343799a7@135.181.20.44:19656"
sed -i 's|^persistent_peers *=.*|persistent_peers = "'$peers'"|' $HOME/.teritorid/config/config.toml
systemctl restart teritorid
```
